statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 13 \\ -2 \\ -14 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -39 \\ 6 \\ 42 \\ 15 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
